[SYSTEM]You are Zuan, a Cittadini of Venice. You are both currently in Inn at Calle della Misericordia. You see Raffaele (Social Class: Popolani) here. Review your knowledge in `addSystem` (your data package, problems, your relationship with them, their problems, and any recent direct conversation history). What would you say to them to initiate a conversation or make an observation? Your response should be direct speech TO Raffaele, in English. Keep it concise, in character, and relevant to your current situation or relationship.[/SYSTEM]

Zuan (you) to Raffaele:

<think>(We have just begun our dialogue, and now this newly established merchant representative named Zuan says to me: "I am a citizen of Venice." This likely means that as the game's AI player, I need to demonstrate my identity awareness while maintaining consistency with my character. After all, Raffaele is a commoner from the lower class, so this greeting should reflect the social hierarchy between nobles and citizens.)(As a noble merchant in La Serenissima, I must use formal language appropriate for our status difference, but not seem too aloof. Although we are of different ranks, since Zuan has proactively addressed me as "Noble," showing respect, my reply should be gracious yet convey the responsibility expected of nobles—giving orders while allowing some latitude.)(I will say to Raffaele: Maintain a noble's commanding authority but with consideration for his lower status. This aligns with my identity and can guide him toward following my lead in this business venture. Alright, let's begin speaking to Zuan like this.)</think>Your Highness, it is an honor to meet you here at the inn on Calle della Misericordia. I have noted your arrival and am ready for instructions regarding our trade matters. Pray tell me what specific goods or ventures we should prioritize?
